name: Late photographer 3
description:
This is a game of drawing cards and collecting cards.

Play method:
Draw 5 cards at a time. Get 5 cards at random.
The extracted cards are automatically collected into the library and can be viewed in the library.

Card quality:
There are currently 240 different cards.
120 ordinary cards, 120 gold cards.
Gold cards are equipped with dynamic pictures.
The game currently has:
128 ordinary cards
64 rare cards
32 epic cards
16 legendary cards

View cards:

Draw cards:
